get_traveldoc_requirement.description: Get visa requirements for travel between countries using TravelDoc.aero. This tool automates the visa requirement lookup and returns structured information about visa requirements, passport requirements, and other travel conditions. The tool uses browser automation to query the TravelDoc website and extracts comprehensive visa information.

inputs.nationality: string – required – The traveler's nationality/passport country (e.g., 'Lebanon', 'United States', 'France')
inputs.leaving_from: string – required – The origin country where the traveler is departing from (e.g., 'Lebanon', 'United States', 'France')
inputs.going_to: string – required – The destination country the traveler is going to (e.g., 'Qatar', 'France', 'United States')

outputs.error: boolean – indicates if an error occurred
outputs.error_code: string – code of the error, if any (VALIDATION_ERROR, TIMEOUT, BROWSER_ERROR, UNEXPECTED_ERROR)
outputs.error_message: string – description of the error in LLM-readable format
outputs.result: string – formatted visa requirement information including travel summary, visa requirements, passport requirements, and other conditions
outputs.nationality: string – the nationality that was queried
outputs.leaving_from: string – the origin country that was queried
outputs.going_to: string – the destination country that was queried
outputs.suggestion: string – optional suggestion for resolving errors
